org.apache.flex.compiler.internal.fxg.dom.richtext

Class TextHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.flex.compiler.internal.fxg.dom.richtext.TextHelper

  • public class TextHelper
extends Object
    Utilities to help create Text.

      • ignorableWhitespace

        public static boolean ignorableWhitespace(String value)
        Determine if a string contains only ignorable white spaces.
        Parameters:
        value - - value to be checked.
        Returns:
        true if value contains only ignorable white spaces, else, return false.
